modName: College Days Perkus Maximus Compatibility Patch
summary: This mod changes the spell books given in College Days to their vanilla equivalents, granting compatibility with Perkus Maximus.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the spell books given in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56699]College Days[/url] to their vanilla equivalents, granting compatibility with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]Perkus Maximus[/url].

This file may not be posted outside of the Skyrim Nexus without my permission.  I will note in this description which sites have my permission to host this file.  (Currently None)

Credit/Thanks:
jvr2400 for his College Days mod.
t3nd0 for his Perkus Maximus mod.
Dave-C for being a salty bastard.  :D
Terrorfox1234 for that thing he does with his tongue.

The author of College Days may integrate this into his mod directly, or post this .esp on the aforementioned mod page if he desires without requesting permission.
The author of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257/?]PCAPP [/url]may include this file without requesting permission with the condition of including an acknowledgement wherever this specific mod's compatibility is mentioned outside of the FOMOD installer.
author: SoundOfDrums
